import React from 'react' import './intro.css' import Github from '../../img/github.png' import Linkedin from '../../img/linkedin.png' // import Instagram from '../../img/instagram.png' import Naukri from '../../img/naukri.png' import boy from '../../img/boy.png' import Vector2 from '../../img/Vector2.png' const Intro = () => { return (
Hi ! I am Sattyam Singh Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Suscipit debitis quia excepturi ipsum, optio eveniet cum eos! Officia, consectetur dolores!
) } export default Intro
